Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Originally purchased a canon MG6220 (see my review, not Mac friendly). Sent back the canon and bought the 837. Epson has really gotten on board with this printer and interface. Excellent user control from the front panel, iPad, Mac, PC, iPhone, Android, even includes eprint function that is extremely useful. Just send an email to your printer and it prints the contents, whether a photo or text. Excellent print and scan functionality and quality. Setup was a breeze. Beautiful photo printing. I love the wireless functionality. I put my CF card in it and browse and transfer the images on my iPad or Mac. Can't do that on the canon. Highest resolution photo printing for printer in this price point. Also has a document feeder, two-sided printing, excellent control over scanning. Actually a very ... attractive printer as well. Really no complaints. Love the iPad app and cloud printing. No need to be in the same room with the printer, or the same country for that matter! expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Easy To Use; Intuitive touch screen; Great Print Quality
We've had the printer for a few weeks, and so far we are very pleased with it. Some of the surprises we are happy about: - It is able to print all the way to the edge even on 8.5x11 sheets. - The copy and scan quality is fantastic. - We're happy with the ink usage so far. - It uses six ink colors (Cyan, Light Cyan, Magenta, Light Magenta, Yellow, and Black) and each color is a separate cartridge, meaning you can replace each color individually as it runs out. A full replacement set cost me about $80, but that's about $15 a cartridge so as I replace cartridges individually I think it will be easier to stomach!
Other reviews had mentioned that it slows down from time to time; this has ... been the case with ours so far as well, but it's not a problem for us. Basically, it will have to "think" longer when printing a sheet of paper sometimes, but this means it comes out in 15 seconds rather than 5, and it's a fairly rare occurrence.
Overall, very impressed and very happy with this printer. We use it mainly for color prints on normal paper (booklets, signs, handouts). We have not used it to print photographs or send faxes, so I can't comment on its performance in those areas. expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: First Epson, won't be my last
Item.Review:
Pros: Looks, print quality, speed of prints, LCD screen, reads memory cards, separate colors
Cons: Takes a couple minutes to go from power on to print ready. Also, did not wash my dishes.
So this printer was selling for 299 when I was interested in it and Best Buy had it on sale for 199.99 when I went to get it, i had 45 bucks in Rewards so I got this printer for right at 150 bucks. This printer is worth 300. I print photos not even on the highest quality and they look amazing and it still prints crazy fast. I have it setup in my living room, not even to a computer, and i sent prints to it over wi-fi. I sent a photo to it and went in to check it about 45 seconds later and the people in the room were like "Wow! That printed fast! It looks great too!". It was that impressive. ... r> The only 2 drawbacks is that when you do print photos, it'll eat the ink up like something fierce. I do moderate printing (rarely photos) and I'm 1/2 way on the stock cartridges 1 month and 1 day later. I'm probably going to invest in an Endless Ink Supply as it's cheaper.
This printer though, is a great printer. One thing I like, if you don't go with the EIS system the colors can be replaced individually something I used to hate about HP, Lexmark, and others.
The only negative is when you start it up it takes a good 2 minutes sometimes before it'll accept something to print which is a bit of a pain but i'm being picky as there really isn't anything else wrong with it. Waiting 2 minutes for a print is definitely a first world problem. If you're looking for printers, get this one. Stop looking, get it. It looks very stylish, is great prints, can hook up wirelessly so no need to have a computer near by, heck, you don't even have to have a computer. It accepts memory cards and you can sort your photos on the LCD screen which is a good size too. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Best All-in-One Printer for everyday use.
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up, document feeder, wireless, quality photo prints.
Cons: Nada
Right out of the box, this printer was easy to set up on my wireless network. But what really impressed me was the quality of prints and scans that it produced. This printer is a replacement for an older Epson photo printer and I am not disappointed at all with our purchase. If you have the means and you're looking for a quality printer/scanner, I highly recommend the Artisan 837.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Pictures; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Fast Print Time; Reliable
If you are printing pictures you have to use epson's paper. The paper is more expensive than others but in my opinion the end result is worth the extra cost. The ink is also a little more than HP's ink but again I compared this to a new hp printer and it blows it away with it's picture quality. the printer comes with a set of ink cartridges but the small ones "99 series" which would yeld about 30-8.5 x 11 prints, so buy the bigger "98 series" cartridges. The printer took about 30 minutes to set up and d/l the software. I had best results printing my pictures in RGB mode and I set the gama to 1.8. Color looks perfect.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: So far very pleased with overall performance.
Item.Review:
Pros: Great price, even when not on sale. Very durable and easy to use and setup.
Cons: Nothing. It is as advertised!
Printer is easy to setup and use. Print quality for photos is excellent and is of photo store quality. Excellent when you need quick photos or just a few special prints. Excellent printing of CDs for labels as well. Easy to use and document printing is of excellent quality as is the fax quality and ease of use. There have been no problems with this printer and we would not hesitate to recommend it to anyone looking for an all in one printer as it is of excellent quality and durability.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Fast; Powerful
Bought this refurb and it has been the best deal I have gotten in awhile. Super easy to setup and not Im up and running. This thing does it all. The CD printing is AMAZING! Love the scan to PDF and JPG. Save yourself some money and just buy this refurb. Would never know it wasnt new.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Setup instructions are complete and alternative methods are well explained. Test prints are crisp and clear. Operating instructions are easy to follow and setting up of all computers on our home network was extremely easy to complete.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
Cons: Large Footprint
I was really impressed with the quality of the printouts I got from scanned photos. Some of the photos I scanned were old and low quality but still turned out great!

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use
I've been looking for a printer that was intuitive to use, performs up to expectations, has a Photo paper tray and works over wifi. This Epson performs all its tasks with no fuss. I have been very happy with its photo and document quality!! Really can't ask for more. I recommend that people download the latest Epson software from the Epson website, don't use the disk, it will save you some trouble. This printer also works well with Apple AirPrint.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Color print quality and wireless printing
Cons: Black & white print quality, unless you like a rose tint.
I bought the Artisan 837 as a replacement for an old HP Photosmart C5180 that, after 5 years, started printing with too much green in the photos. The Artisan was very easy to get onto my wireless (Apple) network. Did contact the Epson Tech Support about a problem in printing black/white (old) photos. The print always showed a rose tint to the photo. The color photos were excellent . Tech support had me download an app called EpsonScann. Turns out it could not "see" separate photos when several were scanned at once. Treated them all as one large photo. Too time-consuming to scan photos one at a time. Seems that Epson Scan was likely written for a Windows sy ... stem. Switched to the Apple Image Capture software which resolved the multiple scan problem. Tech Support was very, very good (located in the USA) but could not resolve the rose tinting problem. I returned the printer to BestBuy, and swapped for a second Artisan 837. Unfortunately, it also tinted all black & white and greyscale photos. Returned it and swapped for an HP 7510 which produces great BW /greyscale and color photos. Pros; Great color printer, Very easy to install and setup. Worked great with all three iMacs, both iPhones, and an iPad2. If you are looking for a great color printer, you will really like this unit. Cons: All B&W and greyscale prints had a slight rose tint to them. Also the paper catcher tray was very thin plastic that protruded from the body when deployed. I felt that this was an accident looking for a place to happen. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Print speed and quality.
Cons: Can't say, I love it.
I absolutely love this printer. The setup was a little long but the results are amazing. The setup was done by touch all on the printer. Unless you are setting up the fax, the only cable needed is the power cable. Yeah I am very satisfied. I really have no cons concerning this work of technological art. I print alot of cd/dvd covers and the quality is amazing for the price, not to mention the speed at which it prints. Best of all I got is on a very nice sale.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Best printer I have ever owned
Item.Review:
Pros: Price, easy wireless setup
After I reviewed printers for several months I decided that this was the printer I wanted. It is easy to set up and the quality is the best I have seen. The feature that I really like is the print to cd. The quality is close to that of CD's that I have purchased. I convert my VHS tapes to DVD and this feature is great. The speed for the 8x10 is somewhat slow, but the final results are worth it.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Very happy with the Epson Artisan 837! The printer looks amazing, easy setup and performs great. Love the software with the machine, very user friendly. I haven't printed any photos yet, but the quality on document prints are good.
One thing I overlooked was the size of the printer itself. Was shocked at first when the box came. Another thing is the glossy surface attracts dust very easily.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: After about 6 years my HP 6100 All-In-One couldn't be revived again. My wife has a Canon MP882 and I was planning to buy a Canon also until I found this machine. I am a photographer and have the Epson Stylus 2200 and the Pro 4000 and I love them both but I wasn't looking for a photo printer. I needed a robust printer with excellent scanning quality. It looks great sitting on the corner of my desk. I like that the ADF has a folding door to protect from dust when it isn't in use. Set up was quick and easy. I connected via USB to my main computer and connected to my laptop, iPad and DroidX via WiFi with no problem. The unit starts up quickly and is much quieter than my HP. Print speed is fast for documents and I like the automatic duplex mode for printing on both sides of the page. T ... he bonus was the quality of the photo prints. I have started using the 837 for proofs. The photo print speed is incredible especially compared to the 2200 and 4000. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Excellent Printer, Easy to Setup, Easy to Use
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality, with Easy Setup.
Cons: The paper tray feels cheap and flimsy. After 120 4x5 photos the ink was almost empty.
Setup of the printer was quick and easy. The print quality for photos is nice and quick. Print driver has many options, that are easy to setup and use. Available Mobile Printing is nice, and easy to set up.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: FAST!!! Color is EXCELLENT!!!
Cons: ink jet, so color runs when the paper gets wet
This is the first time that I've purchased an Epson printer, but I'm very glad that I did! It was very easy to set up on my wireless network. The print cartridges were very easy to install. I like having 5 separate color cartridges--the colors are very vivid. The printer is also very fast. I was originally going to buy a color laser jet, but was persuaded to give this ink jet a try because Best Buy doesn't stock color laser jets.
It is a great value for the money.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I just purchased the EPSON Artisan 837 two days ago and so far I would have to say it appears that it is going to be a great printer for me. I really like the print to disc feature with the tray eject system. The only thing I don't like about this is that I have to do my disc design in Epson's Print CD program. I can't print directly to disc from another program that I've been using for years and love. I'll also have to get used to using a paper tray as in all the previous printers I've owned, I could tell how much paper I had as I always used the rear flip up paper holder where the paper was visible. I own an EPSON Perfection 1660 Photo scanner which I've had for about 10 years. Still have to keep this to do negatives and slides. I think once I get over the above three very minor negative ... s I have, I'm going to find that this printer in the end is going to do a much better job than anything I've previously used by other manufacturers. The print quality is AMAZING on both photo and Matte paper and the scanning features are pretty much the same as my 1660 Photo scanner with the exceptions listed above. The price of the Ink cartridges is very reasonable as well. It still has to pass the test of time. I generally go through two printers a year. I do a lot of printing. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I have only had this new printer a few days and can honestly say that I have tried all it's features with absolutely no hesitation in recommending same. The installation was simpled and easy to follow the instructions. The prints of 4x6 photos were very clear. All the how to instructions are on the scren and easy to follow. Great product

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: 1st Epson printer....no longer a HP customer
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to install and consistantly works
Cons: nothing
after owning +10 HP printers over the last 25 years. I tossed my last 10 month old HP over the balcony. This is the BEST printer by far that I've ever owned and I've owned every level of HP's. This EPSON installs extremely fast and doesn't constantly want to update like other printers. It prints photo's better than HP's photosmart. It has a smaller footprint and the convienent closing flat lid is nice if you aren't scanning or copying documents. Very conv. when you have a small work space. If you've ever owned an HP and are thinking about changing sides, this EPSON is the one.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Not Compatible With Mac; Too much ink used
I am hoping I got a lemon the first time and the second one is better. The Staples personnel have been great to work with, but I am disappointed this printer is not working well with my MAC.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: I have found this to be a very good all-in-one
Item.Review:
Pros: Airplay, Print quality, functionality, Easy Setup, Customer Service
Cons: Nothing so far
The first one I brought home did not turn on. One call to EPSON and they had a brand new one to me in 2 days. Set that up quickly and have been pleased with everything so far. This thing is feature packed compared to any other printer I have owned.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy connection to WiFi
Cons: Needs to be cleaned & recalibrated constantly
I got the Epson because I was having so much trouble getting WiFi to work on my HP printers (bought two of them). This was very easy to set up, connected right away, all was good for about 3-4 months.
After that, I now see two big problems with it:
1) the fax receive is VERY finicky. It doesn't always 'hear' the signal, so I can't rely on it. Not good for a fax machine. 2) it now constantly requires that I clean the nozzle and recalibrate it -- I find I have to do this about every couple of weeks, with normal use. If I don't, printouts are garbled and have poor quality, even with full ink cartridges.
The latter issue especially is a big pain, as I have to stop what I' ... m doing, take about 5-7 minutes to go through the maintenance, and only THEN print out my document, interrupting my work.
I'm going back to the HP - I never had issues with the print quality at ALL, it was a workhorse and while I may have issues again with WiFi, I'd rather have that than the above problems, personally. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Fast Print Time
Cons: Flimsy Construction
The printer seems fine so far. However, I paid [$] a week ago and now you're selling it for [$]. That is a huge difference in price and I feel like I have been ripped off. As a result I will take my business elsewhere.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: This is our first multi-function as well as our first Epson. We are very pleased with our purchase thus far. Read lots of reviews stating the printer's voracious appetite for ink. If photos are the main use and you print them quite often, I might agree. But for occasional printing of a variety of things, it seems fair. Have not tried printing on printable CD/DVDs, but have a couple friends who have this same printer and they are very happy with this function. Apple AirPrint works flawlessly to print straight from our iPhones. Photos are quite good, but would recommend getting them from a photo shop if you are doing a lot, both for cost and durability. Also read a review where someone said it wouldn't work with card stock. I have used 67lb card stock and it works fine. I noticed there is a ... printer setting for thick paper, but have not turned it on, so don't know what it does differently. Anyway, to summarize, wait for this printer to go on sale and buy it. We and two of my friends are all glad we did!! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: What a beautiful printer! It was easy to install and prints from computers, iPads and iPhones like a dream. I highly recommend purchasing this awesome printer. Excellent value for the money spent.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast printing; great color; easy loading ....
Cons: Difficult to find color ink packs [hi-capacity].
This is the best color printer I have had; it is easy to use, it seems more economical of ink use than previous printers; it closes to a wife-pleasing appearance; AND IT PRINTS ON OPTICAL DISKS. And: the price was within my price range.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I'm impressed with the photo scan and print quality. Also, I really like the duplex printing. I reccommend this product to anyone wanting a printer at a very resonable price.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Has many features in one machine
Item.Review:
Pros: easy to use
Cons: filling paper is could be better
I have always loved my Epson printers and scanners. It's nice to have all the features of a scanner, copier and printer in one unit. It also has other features I hope to use once I know the all-in-one better. Colors and clarity is the best!

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I purchased this printer for my studio to create professional~quality CD albums for the church. The price was right and the setup was Flawless on my Windows 7 Pro. 64-Bit machiene. This is my first Epson product, thouroughly impressed. Money well spent on a Quality product.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: fast and easy to set up
Cons: high price but then it went on sale!
I print from 4 different computers plus my iPhone and iPad wirelessly. Very fast and great quality. Easy to set up for both Windows XP and 7. Had a previous version but so old that couldn't print from my apple products. Very happy now.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Love this printer - easy set up
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Great photo printer; Reliable; Fast Print Time
I use this for two main reasons: (1) photo prints and (2) documents for work. It is easy to set up. I use it wirelessly which was automatic. When I changed routers I just turned the printer off and on and it found the new router and adjusted the settings. You can feed paper by and through the rear of the printer for heavy/long photo paper.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: It took five minutes, max, to set up the wireless
Cons: I can't think of a thing... though I haven't had to replace the ink yet so there is always that!
This is a stellar performer. It took maybe five minutes to get it up and running, including the wireless setup. Better than that, the print quality is terrific (both pictures and pages) and it is really fast. I knocked out a school presentation for my son in no time, just minutes out of the box. I am a big fan.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: All in One Says it All
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time; Easy To Use; Durable construction
Cons: None
I upgraded to the Artisan 837 from an Epson 5 year old (still working) Stylus Photo RX680. I needed a wireless machine and a built in fax. I'm amazed at how well this 837 works every time I use it. So far, so good, but Epson has never dissapointed me. The photos are great but that is really not a concern (I have all my larger images printed at a photo lab). Expect to have this one a long time. Very happy with the ease of setting up and using the wireless function. Thanks Epson.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Low Ink Consumption; Versatile; Reliable; Easy To Use; Fast Print Time; Easy To Set Up; Durable construction
Cons: Large Footprint
I bought this to replace my Epson CX9400fax. It does everything better. Better quality pictures, faster printing, double sided printing. The WiFi is perfect for me since my home has 3 computers, 1 laptop, a tablet, and 4 phones. Was expecting it to be a difficult setup but only took a few minutes. The five ink system really makes pictures great.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I bought this all in one to replace a Workforce 320. It is much easier to set up for all operations, and produces good pictures also. I use it for business faxing, scanning and copying, it works really well, only mis-fed paper once during printing (2 sheets instead of one). The Workforce was horrible for faxing, this one is easy to use. I also have a Photo R220 which is years old, it still produces great pictures. I am a firm Epson person, have had other brands but this is my 6th Epson.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Scanning, most photo printing
Cons: printing text, very dark photo printing
I love this printer. On normal pictures, the quality and color range are superb. The color accuracy of scans is very high.
It does, however, have two drawbacks that keep me from giving it that last star. The first is minor--the text quality is kind of greyish. The second is more substantial--on photos with large amounts of black (despite being aligned, cleaned, having fresh cartridges, and using high-quality Epson paper), there is a good deal of striping in the black areas. I wound up printing the few very dark photos I have on a different printer.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything
Cons: Ink consumption, but isn't this true of all printers
This is the best all in one I have ever purchased. Easy set up both wired and wireless. Ability to fax is an added plus and also easy to set up. Printing documents and pictures are done effortless with no loss of print quality.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Ok, printer, Too expensive for the results !!!
Item.Review:
Cons: Would not recommend for serious photo printing !!!
i purchased this printer only for photo printing. i was told that it would be great for printing photos. unfortunately, i found it very hard to get the colors correct while using different photo printing software. Also, the paper trays, especially the main tray is very flimsy. i ended up wasting a lot of expensive photo paper due to this problem. i would have expected a lot more from Epson. Tech support could not solve my problems. Fortunately i was able to return it.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Decent printer for light to moderate usage
Item.Review:
Pros: Print Quality, Scan Quality, takes up less space that other All In Ones
Cons: Wireless configuring, paper handling, ADF function
Purchased this on sale for about $150. I love the quality of the printout. The scanner takes considerable time to scan, both from the Document Feeder as well as from the actual glass platform. I had a previous All In One that was considerably faster. Furthermore, the ADF jams easily. The printer is very particular about paper; at least a few times a week, I find that it has picked up three or four pieces together. I have never had this before. I strongly suggest that you scan via either ethernet cable or to a flash drive. The wireless feature is quite frustrating; it asks to where you would like to scan, and then fails to detect other ... computers on the network until you have tried three or four times. I purchased this AIO to use at a home office. The unit takes up half as much room as my previous device, and I have had excellent results with other Epson devices. I consider the issues mentioned above to be annoyances, but perhaps not "deal breakers". expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Photo quality
Cons: Print speed
Set up was quick. Operation not as fast as I wanted. The photo quality is excellent much better than PS settings. Always trust the printer.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Ease of use, fast printing, great print quality
Cons: Ink consumption while print head cleaning!
I've been using Epson for the past 5 years & there's always 1 thing in common with all the printers. They break within 1-3 months after the manufacturer's warranties run out. Unlike all the previous times, I bought it from Best Buy instead of buying direct from Epson store for the convenience factor & also to supplement it with an extended warranty. So far so good. I use Artisan mainly to print on discs. Direct disc printing is excellent, both in quality and ease. Canon and HP can't compete with that. Also, the disc printing software (Epson Print CD) is a very easy program to use. Love the touch screen LCD panel as well. Only real gripe is the ink cost. Initializatio ... n out of the box took quite a while (the set-up brochure said 7 minutes) & wasted a lot of the ink. The printer's head cleaning (when you turn the printer on or when you replace cartridges) waste a lot of ink as well every time. Aside from that, I love my Epson printers. I've gone thru Artisans 810, 730, 700, Photo R260, R360, RX595, and RX680. Can't beat the print quality and speed! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: This was a great buy for any use
Item.Review:
Pros: all the features at the touch of a finger. Price was right and setup easy.
Cons: No Cons
I bought this printer when my RX 860 started giving me trouble. I searched many other stores and on line and each one was very close in Price. When I checked Best Buy they had it on sale for less than half the price of the other stores. and it was in stock. The features are excellent and I compared my needs with other Epson printers, and this printer is top shelf in my book.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great quality
Cons: Best Buy Geek Squad is not up to date with MAC compatibility issues
I was very disappointed at first with this printer. Because I had a MAC OS 10.6, I was not able to use the wireless feature when scanning, so I had to hook up using a USB cable to scan. I also had to use the touch panel. I was not able to scan a multiple page document to a single document and the paper feeder did not work while scanning. After many hours online with TECH SUPPORT both at Epson and Best Buy (Geek Squad was no help at all!!!!), an Epson tech support technician found the solution. MAC users need to download a driver on the Epson web site. Go to Epson.com. Click Drivers and Support/All in One Printers/All in One/Epson 837/Macintosh Drivers and Downloads/Epson Scan Utility ... v3.78. This will put the Epson Scan application on your computer's desktop. Using this to scan rather than the touch panel will enable you to easily use the automatic feeder as well as to be able to scan multiple pages to one document. I wish someone out there had told me about it. After that, the product is awesome. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient; Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Sometimes feeds 2 sheets
Had equivalent HP model for 3 years. This Epson is much faster in printing, scanning, and everything it does. The wifi connection was very quick and easy. The display panel is large and much easier to use.
My only complaint is the paper feeder. It often feeds several sheets of blank paper when printing so that the unused sheets have to be put back into the paper stack. I bought thicker paper and this may be the best solution.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Photo reproductions.
I purchased this printer for my neighbor who is an artist. She needed something that would reproduce her photographs and paintings. The set up at her house was on both pc and mac. The wireless made setup a breeze. The color reproduction was fast and accurite.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Would prefer more control over output
Item.Review: Let me begin by saying I have always bought Epson printers. In this case I didn't have the money to buy a top of the line printer I just wanted good color output. This printer was recommended to me by the sales associate at Best Buy. I was excited to find a printer for printing mostly digital images for presentations at a great price. However, the old saying "you get what you pay for" is very true in this case. The first print looked OK not a great deal of depth in the color but OK. After that it is hit or miss everytime and you do not have any control at all other than selecting paper type. So it ends up that I am disappointed in this particular printer. I would like to see the prints the sales associates is able to get with it.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Quiet
Cons: Jams Easily
This is a good printer but the cost of the ink is very expensive. After recycling my old printer and this one on sale I got a good deal. However, buying 2 complete refills for this printer is the same cost as the original purchase for the new printer. That is CRAZY! They need to lower their prices on ink or make them refillable by [@]. Check out HP for more reasonable printer options since this ink is SO EXPENSIVE!!!!

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Intuitive controls; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Low Profile; Quiet
Cons: Photo prints low quality; Flimsy Construction; Slow Operation; Color copies poor
I did a lot of research on which all-in-one inkjet printer to replace my aging HP 7400. The Epson Artisan 837 was highly rated in reviews by both professionals and recent users. I must have one of the lemons as the color printing is just pathetic. Photo prints and color copies are a waste of ink if you want near laser quality from an inkjet like I expected. The small ink cartridges might be cheap, but they don't last very long so I suspect the "bottom line" cost for ink parallels other inkjet printers with larger cartridges...no savings there. I wish I had stuck with HP products instead of switchi ... ng to Epson. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Easy To Use; Fast Operation; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Large Footprint
Wifi works great, such an improvement over last HP. Does jam on occasion but, so far, not a huge problem. Would recommend for the wireless value alone with having exellent picture quality.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: This printer works great. Printing from iPad is finally easy. Fax is working great and the ADF for scanning is super as well. Text recognition isn't great unfortunately so I have to scan to B&W PDF and that increases the file size by 500% (30kb text recognition file becomes 150kb B&W file). I wished the advertised photo tray was for regular size paper or envelopes. Apparently it only handles up to 5x7 paper. Everything else was good and setup easy.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design
Cons: Slow Operation; Noisy; Poor Picture Printing; Jams Easily
It's slow. Printing pictures have poor quality. When printing envelopes, the paper has to be removed in order for it to print. My old printer was much faster and did a better job of prining.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: It works like a printer should
Item.Review:
Pros: Price, easy to set up, reliable
Cons: NA
I bought this specifically because it has the disc printing feature. I own a photography business and I also use it to make 4x6 and 5x7 prints. The prints are flawless and vibrant. The best thing is that it just works. I had an HP that seemed to work when it wanted to and this is there when I need it.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Fast Operation; Easy To Use; Great Print Quality
Cons: Large Footprint; Noisy
Love it! Replacing an HP printer that was inconsistent and was always running out of ink.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Scanner is crip and clear, Wireless is fantastic, the quality of prints are beautiful. The copier is able to print on both sides of the paper= pretty slick. I was amazed at the quality of the print job this Atrisan 837 does on CD's. I printed off 30 of these in full color, using the software that came with the program, and they look professional. It hardly used any ink for these. The ink lasts a long time. Don't be shy of the slightly higher price for the printer, the quailty is there, and it doesn't go through ink like crazy.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Quiet; Fast Operation; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Great Print Quality
Cons: Runs out of ink quickly
nicest photos i have ever seen. nicer than photo labs.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
Cons: Large Footprint
Replaced my Epson 810 with 837 since the auto feed on the 810 went bad with only light use. Hope for better performance from the 837. After reading all of the reviews on multifunction printers Epson is still the best bet for quality of printing, cost of cartridges, and overall quality of the printer. Got it on sale at Staples and it was a "real deal." Other than the "auto feed" on the old printer it is still working and printing just fine.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Great Print Quality; Easy To Set Up; Fast Operation; Easy To Use
This is a great printer. The print quality is fantastic. It was very easy to set up as well as operate. The colors are vivid. I would definitely recommend it to anyone. The ink refills are a little pricey, but I'm still using the starter ones that came with the printer. I'm hoping I get lots of use from the new ones as well.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Operation; Great Print Quality; Compact Design; Excellent service support
Cons: Noisy; Hard Setup; Flimsy Paper Tray
I would rate this product 5 stars, however it needs some improvement. It's noisy. Paper tray is difficult to use and has too many functions. I thought that Epson would offer a tray which is used for standard printing because of the automatic "print both sides" function. Also, setup for scanning requires extra steps and this is not explained in the documentation. Called Epson support and they helped guide me through the setup

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Operation; Reliable; Great Print Quality; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
I am absolutely in love with this printer. I have used Epson in the past and was very unhappy. I then switched to HP which lasted me years, but I was never really thrilled with the printer. I decided to give Epson another try because of a Staples sales person and I am sooo glad I did. This printer was super super easy to setup on my wireless network. The pages print very fast and the print quality is amazing. I would highly recommend this printer.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Great Print Quality; Links Up With Smartphone; Stylish; Fast Operation
What a worlds difference from my HP OfficeJet. Never considered an all in one until I saw this one and used it. Great for scanning, faxing and printing. The ability to link up to my smartphone and print using Epson iPrint is just awesome. The wireless feature was a breeze hooking up to a laptop. I would highly recommend this to anyone that needs a printer that does it all. Good job Epson!

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Will not connect to one computer
Item.Review:
Pros: Prints quickly; Great Print Quality
Cons: Large Footprint; Hard Setup
This prints well from the computer to which it was able to connect. The other one would not connect no matter how I tried to connect it. I've just resorted to using the one computer when I know I'm going to print. Sadly, it is the computer right next to the printer which would not connect.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: I LOVE this printer, use it mainy for photos.
Item.Review:
Pros: Photo printing, versatility and features.
Cons: It's pretty big. Color prints on regular paper not so sharp.
I had never considered an 'all-in-one' until my HP finally stopped playing well with Windows 7. I was never really crazy about the photo print quality or the support with the HP so I researched other options.
Once I started using the Artisan 837 I began to wonder how I got along without this thing for as long as I had! While I do not use the FAX function, I use the scanner/copier feature quite often. For a quick copy here and there, the copy function is fast and the quality is great. However, if it is a large document, I prefer to scan the document to my computer then print it off on my laser printer to save inkjet ink.
I also bought some Epson bran ... ded photo paper to print photograps on. The quality on 4x5 prints are FAST and just as beautiful as the prints I get from a local photo lab (Walgreens, etc). Ink dries quick to the touch and you can replace ink just one color at a time.
Other units out there are a little or a lot cheaper. However, the quality on a printer using only 3-colors is much lower quality and the inks much more expensive. Yes, the Epson costs more upfront, but makes up for everything else in quality.
Now, everything is not rosey. Though I am sitting here bragging about the photo print quality, I have to say the color prints on regular heavy-bond paper are not as sharp as my old printer. That said, I bought this to print photographs. I typically don't like to waste ink printing color webpages and documents so that doesn't bother me. Epson sells a special 'presentation' paper but I have not yet tried it.
Also, this machine is pretty big. Do yourself a favor and look at the measurement specifications. Measure out the spot where you plan on installing this to see if you'll have enough room. If you do not install the included "double-sided duplexer", you can save about four inches in the depth like I did at first.
Great printer, works wonderfully out of the box and can be tweaked to your liking. I LOVE this printer. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: A lot of features, prints very nice
Cons: Paper feed
This is actually a very good printer. I did my research and picked this one for the wireless printing, speed, and quality of print. The problem is that every time it tries to feed paper it grabs multiple sheets. I have tried several different types of paper and it still does it. I have tried to manually separate the paper individually and it still didn't work. Tried to contact Epson customer service 3 different times and never have received a response. I've had it too long to take it back so I am stuck manually feeding one sheet at a time. It's very possible I got a lemon, but I wanted to put this review out there to let everyone know.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Use
We've had it a short time. It does print great pictures. I've used it for 2 sided docs with color and black and white. It prints fast but it seems to use a little more ink than our last printer but not too bad. Overall a really nice printer.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: This is the best printer i ever had, i always have epson printe, i print a lot of pictures, this is one of the fastest speed printe, it si easy to instal usb or wi-fi, i tried both. the paper rack is small but acceptable, i would prefer a 100 sheet instead of 30, i used it only in wifi mode for several wweeks and no problem at all.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Use; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up
We had looked around for an all-in-one that was compatible with a Mac. This is the 3rd machine we have purchased and so far it is wonderful. Easy wireless set-up, although the fax setup for an answering machine was somewhat unclear, but finally mastered it. Best printer we have purchased!

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: This printer replaced an inconsistent all-in-one printer from another manufacturer. In all my photographic work, I have always heard that Epson printers are the best. I couldn't afford one of the large format photo Epson printers and I needed the fax, etc. capabilities. This is a revelation; does all things well even printing photos that are clear and vibrant. I'm very pleased with the product.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:

Cons: none no cons here
I still dont believe this this burn $14 worth of electricity a year...

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Use; Durable construction; Low Ink Consumption; Easy To Set Up; Reliable
I owned a fantastic Canon printer for several years but when it finally gave out, I went shopping at Staples. The guys showed me this Epson Printer, great features and a reasonable price so I bought it and I'm darn glad I did! Easy set-up and it makes fantastic copies and really professional photos. I would recommend this printer to anyone wanting a high quality printer at a reasonable price.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Simplicity itself to set up wirelessly for a desk top, laptop (Macs) and an iPad. Photo and print quality is excellent. Scanner set up was automatic. Just remember to load the photo paper in face down!

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Love it compared to the HP printer
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Easy To Use; Compact Design; Durable construction; Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time; Low Ink Consumption
Compared to my HP all in one, this one is best so far. It is easy to use and has great color photos. I have a Canon printer as well and the Epson put out better color photos. I would recommend this one to anyone!

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Easy to set-up, put the CD in and it leads you thru the entire set-up. Scan is so easy, never could get it done easily on my other HP all in one. Great menu, easy to use. Nice screen for the menu, controls, and preview of pictures. So far I very happy. Ink is not that expensive comparded to other brands and you only need to change one color at a time.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Paper tray seems flimsy
Cons: Too much ink used; Set up problems; Steep learning curve; Flimsy Construction; Hard Setup
I use the printer many times a day doing genealogy papers and photos, printing and scanning. The scanner has good resolution, but is very slow. I have tried multiple times to get the USB and Memory card ports to work...will have to call tech support. Not in love with it yet.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Reliable; Fast Print Time
More network friendly than my HPs. Print quality seems very good. Can instantly print from all my Apple devices.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Use; Low Ink Consumption; Good for photos; Compact Design
Cons: Hard Setup; Difficult Support
This printer does not play well with Macs. At least you cannot use the software disk enclosed with the printer when connecting to a Mac. I tried to download Mac software from the Epson website. But that was not easy. Even with a 30mbps cable connection, the site informed me it would take over 90 minutes. Are you kidding me? So I called support. That took almost 90 minutes. Poor phone connection (what do you expect when calling the Philippines?) and an agent (actually two) that could not explain how to get my new printer to communicate with my Mac (running Snow Leopard at the time). They did not speak English very clearly either.
After ... using the printer for several weeks, it's just OK. Nothing stunning. One problem is that printed sheets sometimes come out with two or more blank sheets stuck to them. Not a very good paper handling system apparently! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time; Reliable; Compact Design; Durable construction; Easy To Use
Cons: Jams Easily
We bought this when our Lexmark printer died, and it has been a dream! It is great for printing (double-sided, too), copying, scanning, faxing, etc! I can't wait to start scanning and editing old photos, as our old printer couldn't do that very well. The only drawback is (every once in awhile) if the paper isn't in exactly the right spot, it will suck in 2 pieces of paper at the same time, which is inconvenient, but not the end of the world. It is still fantastic at everything else! Love the flip-open document feeder and the easy-to-use touch screen!!!

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Easy To Use
I love this printer! So glad to have wireless and it prints beautifully and quickly - whether it's documents or pictures. The scan function is extremely usefull and you are able to preview your scan and make adjustments to it prior to scanning in and saving, which is great. Compact design (compared to my BIG old Brother machine, which was great for it's time, but now I don't need that hefty of an All-in-One.
My only wish is that the ink cartridges lasted longer and didn't cost so much (approx. $19 for the high capacity ones, but since I'm used to toner for my Brother that would last for thousands of pages at about $70, the $19 for a lot less pages adds up to more by the time you reach thousands of pages.) But, t ... hat said, the $19 a cartridge is still less than many of the other inkjets out there.
All in all, a great little printer/scanner/copier/fax machine!! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: worse printer I have ever had
Item.Review:
Pros: No pros
Cons: Hard Setup; Prints very POOR pictures; Too much ink used; Hard To Use
We had wanted the HP 6600 all in one but allowed your salesman to sell us this unit. Never again, the ink cost and usage is very high and in 3 months we spent enough on ink to have went back and purchased the HP6600 that we originally wanted. I contacted the chat line to see if we could exchange the unit but were told NO! not allowed. So we are stuck with the Epson unit. We are going tonight to get the HP we originally wanted and will attempt to sell the Epson, but will not listen to your salesman again. Not a satisfied customer

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:

Cons: Having to remember to pull out the tray everytime you print so your document doesn't fall on the floor.
Works really well. We are enjoying the quick printing. Setting up the printer was easy.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Best printer I have owned to date
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy set up to Mac, great quality photos, fast printing, good document printing, scans ,FAX's & copies.
Cons: Nothing so far
Great prints, Copies, Photos and scans. FAX also. I've owned many competetive brands and none match the Epson. I'm sold. Works great with my Apple computers wirelessly. Using OS10.7.4 No problems what so ever. Still using the same ink cartridges. Very low ink consumption.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast photo printing
Cons: Can't use double sided paper for greeting cards, etc. Also uses a lot of toner.
I am very happy with the photo quality from this printer. However, I had to print invitations that were on Avery double sided paper and it wouldn't work. It jammed when trying to print the 2nd side.
It also uses a lot of toner.
The paper tray is poor quality and very flimsy to handle.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I had the Artisan RS680 and liked the quality picture printing and loved the two paper trays. I now have the Artisan 837 and still get the quality picture printing with the added fax that gets used more than I anticipated. However the 837 only has the front paper tray which is a pain when switching from pictures to text. To have the rear (second paper tray) would be a great asset. Both machines are great for their ink usage when compared to other brands.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast and efficient. Does not waste ink.
Cons: Slightly flimsy construction but no problem if handled with care.
I've been using this series of printers for quite a while now. I recently replaced one and bought this model. I really like it. The print quality is about as good as you can expect from an inkjet printers. Photos on the proper paper are sometimes better than the regular commercial prints. It's wireless and works well with my network enabling all functions to be used by all computers on the network. It's great value for the money and I heartily recommend it.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time; Easy To Use
We have been through countless HP printers with NO success. Our last printer was a Lexmark which was less than optimal. This has been BY FAR the easiest set up & use. I will write a review later to report how it functions after using it for sometime.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything
Cons: Nothing
This is the first Epson printer that I have owned and it is, by far, the very best printer I have ever owned. This printer is very well built and operates like a much more expensive printer. I don't print photos on this printer so I can't comment on the quality of photo printing. However, everthing else about this printer is fantastic. I will only purchase Epson printers from now on.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything
Cons: Nothing i can think of
I was looking for a printer that woud print from my iPad, iPhone (air print), and also print good quality photos at a fair speed.. That is it.. It actually has a good speed for an inkjet, much better than the brother i had, stores papers wich is an A+, (speacially if u have kids printing coloring pages all the time) prints into a printable cd, and has a stunning photo quality.. Very good looking printer... Easy set up (for my iMac) and i bought for a very good price.. Highly recommended *_*

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:

Cons: Inkjet cartridges expensive!!!
Although I like the speed of this machine over the HPs I have purchased, and the print quality is good, I find this printer to be VERY expensive to operate. I have only owned this printer for 1 month and have already spent the cost of the machine again in inkjet cartridges. I will probably replace it very soon with a more expensive laser printer that will cost less to maintain. :(

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Good print quality. AirPrint, wireless needs work.
Item.Review:
