Cons: Won't do wireless printing from more than one source
Prints very nice & fairly fast, easy to set up and use. However, it doesn't "remember" wireless network and we're always having to set it up again and again each time we print from our computer or either of our iPhones. AirPrint doesn't remember multiple iPhones and you need to use it through a separate router for more consistent results (when it remembers the router address)! Disappointed since we bought it for the AirPrint "capability."
BLUETOOTH WOULD BE BETTER!

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use
Cons: It's a bit bulkier than what I used to have.
My old printer was going through ink like crazy and I wasn't doing that much printing. I do a lot of scanning and needed a great scanner and also reduce the amount of $ spent on ink. The document print quality is great and I haven't had to replace any ink yet.
I did have to install the software a few times but I plugged it in too early, so that might be partially my fault.
Easy to use!

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Fast Operation; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Quick
Cons: Noisy; Not easy paper accessible
I am a HP buyer by habit. But, the last HP photo printer I purchase I had to replace in the first 14 days and the 2nd one did not last the year. Thank god I bought the extended warrantly and took that refund and purchase this epson Artisan.
For the most part I am very pleased with it. The comments that I did read and did a lot of that were way positive. Prints the 4x6 super fast, don't have to wait for the picture to dry. Comes with full regular cartridges. Even though I was told just samples - so if you don't have the funds right off don't worry about the additional ink unless you are a business.
It has done some amazing photo restores ... from the printer without even having to scan to the pc and do the photoshoping! Print the restore print instantly.
Easy to operate without reading the book, but don't miss out on the additional features it has! Still checking them out - like faxing. also have not tried the cd printing option since I create Photo Scrapbook cds this will be a feature I cannot wait to use. But, it does have to be special printable cds.
Con: It is a tad noisy printing. If you are a paper changer you have to pull the tray right out to change the paper. With my other printer I could lay a paper or label on the top without tray removal. So now use an old printer for my shipping labels. I feel the in and out of the try just may shorten the life of it. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: It was a little tricky at first to print because there are so many options but once I understood what each options were for, Everything I printed looks amazing. I print all my marketing, coupons and flyers. The type of paper and quality does make a HUGE difference in how crisp the photo/documents turn out so MAKE SURE you don't go cheap on paper!

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: set-up not as easy as advertised -- needed help
Item.Review:
Pros: Price
Cons: simplicity - maybe over-engineered to save on buttons
still have problems with a window that shows up each time I print. I get the job done but I don't understand the problem window. I have to "x" it out 3-4 times before it finally disappears. Also, using FAX is just too complicated and the "touch" system ( instead of actual buttons) is poor. I have to "touch" a number several times before it registers. Just too slow a process. Compared to the HP I was using, it stinks! FAXing was always a simple process but not now - - - too complicated!

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Efficient; Reliable; Easy To Set Up
Cons: No tray for the output
I like this printer. It does and outstanding job printng photos. The email printing is nothing short of great.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Good overall printer however I do not think it is an N wireless printer as advertised. I could not setup the printer using my code for my Apple N router using WPA2. It is advertised as WPA2 compatible. First I had to set it up as WPA/WPA2 instead. Then I had to SHORTEN my wireless code by 14 characters. This finally got it to work. NOT VERY SECURED. Now I fear my wireless router is not as secured as it was. They need to make sure this is a true N wireless device. I have many N wireless devices at home and none of them have a problem with the original pass phrase. Ugh.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: quality to cost ratio
Cons: somewhat bulky, make sure you have space.
prints excellent quality photss as well as documents. Excellent scanning capability for photos or documents.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient; Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up
My first experience with Epson and so far a positive one. Faster than previous printers and the print quality seems sharp. Still need to compare ink usage with other brands I have used.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: all-in-one features
Cons: wireless N is 2.4GHz only
This is the best Epson printer I ever owned with awesome print quality for documents and photos, excellent scanning and copying features. Haven't tested the fax yet. Finally, I decided to buy all-in-one unit, after reading many reviews (PC World, Cnet and others), which prized the quality, functionality and price. This is my third Epson printer and I will stick with that brand as I cherish quality, reliability and long lasting equipment. Both previous two printers that I had were 5+ years and still working when I gave them away.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Print quality; Easy setup; User interface and software is user friendly
Cons: Can't print labels; OCR not consistent
I bought this to replace an older Epson inkjet printer and HP scanner for home use. Installation and setup were easy (I set it up using WiFi connection and no cables). The print quality is spectacular and have not had any problems to date. Since the paper feed mechanism rolls the paper 180 degrees, it will not print labels, which was something I didn't consider at the time of purchase. The scanner works as expected, although the quality and alignment are better if you scan one page at a time as opposed to using the automatic paper feed. I've tried scanning in documents, to create searchable pdf files, but the OCR is not consistent, even when scanning at 3 ... 00dpi and above. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great printing Job Beautiful Detail Work
Item.Review: I believe this to be one of the best printers on the market. definitely a very very good deal for the cost. Excellent print quality and all the complaints I had with the Artisan 810 have been spoken to with the Artisan 837. Have to say I'm very very happy with this printer. Highly recommend it.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy setup
Cons: Poor quality printing and many print errors
Picked this printer recently without much due diligence. I had an Epson product previously and it worked great. This one? Not so good. Setup was easy. Had it up and running in about 10 minutes. Sent a 5 page document to print and had first two blank pages stick together so half a page printed on one piece of paper, while the second half printed on the other blank paper. Of the remaining 4 pages of print, 2 printed out at an angle. Pages came out wet, and print quality was poor. Tried it for a few more days / jobs, but the sticking pages, angle prints, and wet pages kept happening. Problems experienced roughly 50% of the time. Gave up, returned it, and bought a HP Officejet Pro 8600 Plus. More money but working ... great. Good news is that other than a quick check to ensure no damage, BestBuy refunded my purchase with no problems. Thanks for that! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Great Print Quality; Easy To Use; Fast Operation; Quiet; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Large Footprint
I have had this printer for about a month and its one of the best things I've ever bought. I abosultely recommend this printer, especially if you are a crafter. I have printed on CDs, on fabric for quilting and several photos so far for gifts this season. I wasn't a big photo printer before, but this printer has changed that. Claria inks are amazing, no smudges and instantly dry enough to handle. Even after washing fabric photos, no loss of ink or picture quality! I understand ink is expensive, but it's worth it in the long run. You can count on quality prints with this that won't fade over time, even if they get wet. For those who say the trays are flimsy plasti ... c, I would somewhat agree, but what isn't these days? I have never had an issue, but I don't have kids to mess with it. In my opinion it doesn't take anything away from it and as long as you take care of it, it should last a very long time. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: DVD Print
Cons: Letter Size Photo maximum size.
Had the Epson Artisan 810 and broke after 2 years. Upgraded to the Artisan 837 and got even cleaner prints. I can print on DVDs, I can print photos, cards, copy, fax, legal size, envelopes, double side and it's wireless. Works with my macs and PCs. If someone says that the printer doesn't work is because they didn't know how to use it. This printer only has a one year warranty so make sure you buy BlackTie protection for either 2 or 4 years.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great all-in-one, easy setup!
Cons: I'll let you know if I find one :)
I just bought this because I couldn't pass up this sale. I saved $120. Im a Epson printer girl, this is replacing rx580(that still works and I will be handing down to my cousin). But I'll update once when I try everything. I'm excited and loving the wireless print that is my main reason for buying. I print photos monthly but with this printer it's gonna be used A LOT more!

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Fast Operation; Great Print Quality
Quality of photo prints are better than I expected for a low cost printer. Was very easy to set up. Love the ability to print from my IPAD.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I've owned this product for only 6-weeks so my user opinion is qualified accordingly! I use this product in my home office for printing documents, a few photos (I have another high-end photo printer for this purpose), scanning, copying and faxing. I love the user-friendly, intuitive layout of the LCD Screen. Print quality, scan and copy quality are great. Setup and use has been easy and trouble-free. FYI, on the negative side some of the components appear to be a made of a light plastic. I don't think I'd recommend the unit if used in an office where the production level is more demanding or frequent. That said, for our various needs, the Artisan 837 has been a great addition for our home office needs.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: looks nice
Cons: everything else
I purchased this printer 1 day ago to replace a Canon MP990 that did nothing but give me fits. Easy to set up. Other reviewers are correct, the flip out print tray is very very thin and I can see it breaking easily - the problem is, without it out prints just drop to the floor.
I tested printing photos. The printer used so much ink that it all ran together and now - 14 hours later - the ink is still wet! It basically poured ink out onto the photo paper.
Waste of $ and it's going back to best buy today.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Convenient wifi; Fast Operation; Print from iPhone; Great Print Quality; Quiet
Cons: Touchscreen buttons iffy; No 2-sided copying; Flimsy Construction
We wanted an all-in-one printer that would print nice photos and could print 2-sided documents. A little disappointed that it can't copy both sides of the document, but man, are the photos impressive. It's also a lot faster printing black & white documents than our previous HP all in one. Would have liked a 110-220 power supply, but it does take 50-60 Hz, so we can take it overseas with a small transformer. Given the sale price, this was a great deal.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up
Cons: Noisy; Flimsy Papertray; Mammoth Footprint
I read in the reviews that this printer has a big footprint and I thought...in this day of technology how big could it really be? Well, I was stunned to unpack a mammoth instead of a printer, which I don't have the space for. Next time I will buy in the store instead of online. It is also very noisy. On the plus side, I like the easy setup and its print quality is very good.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Perfect for the iPad or iPhone
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up and no need to buy a HP to get iPad and iPhone connectivity!
This multifunction printer does it all and was a snap to set up for iPad and iPhones. Perfect for the home or office. Great color for photos, too.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; IPhone direct printing; Great Print Quality; Wireless networking; Direct fax from Mac
Cons: Hard Setup; Lion setup complex
The Epson Artisan 837 is a true all-in-one. It prints from a Mac or PC; it prints wirelessly over wi-fi; you can print directly from an iPod, iPhone, or iPad using AirPrint. It prints excellent quality photos - from your computer, a camera memory card, an iOS device, or a USB connected camera, or drive. It scans both wired and wireless. It faxes - as a stand-alone fax and even will fax directly from a Mac running lion. It has a page feeder and prints duplex.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Great Print Quality; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Jams Easily
Epson needs to do it's homework and research papers for it's approved list. Either that or expand it's own paper line. None of Avery's papers are on the list, so if you prints postcards and greeting cards, you are left in the dark.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: You get what you pay for...
Item.Review:
Pros: lots of features for a low price
Cons: slow, noisy, home quality - but not office quality
Compared to my old Epson, this thing is a great value. Compared to my 10 year old Brother MFD, it's not that great.
So I guess it depends on your frame of reference. If you are used to office quality (and office speed) scanners and printers, you may not be happy with this slow and noisy machine. On the other hand, if you are comparing it to cheap, $50 printers from a few years ago, it certainly provides a lot of features for a very affordable price.
Just don't expect too much from what is still a bargain priced printer.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Paper Catcher
The only thing so far that is a negative is when you print the paper "catcher" has to be pulled out and a tab flipped up manually. So when you print from wireless in another room the paper spits out onto the floor( we have the printer on a cabinet not a table) - not good!

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Smaller than previous printer. Works pretty fast
Cons: Paper tray is cumbersome to come out and put in more paper.
I like it so far. Needs to be an easier way to replace paper.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Prints Pretty Well
Cons: Jams Easily; Hard To Use; Too much ink used; Flimsy Construction; Hard Setup
I use it for genealogy several hours a day, sometimes more, and print out lots of documents each day, and e-mails from other researchers I work with. The ink virtually "disappears". I had an HP for many years and never had to change ink as frequently or as soon as this.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Bright Pictures; Compact Design; Fast Print Time; Fast Speed; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
Cons: Will Not Take Hp Paper; Don~~~apos~~~t Care For Black
I have only had the printer for a little over a week now and i was trying to do a picture, the pictures were turning out very grainey and blurred, so I switch from HP photo paper to staples photo plus paper, and the pictures turned out beautiful. So I am happy with that. It also prints real nice to, just getting use to it, but it seems to be a very fine printer & Photo maker. Just need to take the time to figure it out.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Fast Print Time; Great Photo Features; Easy To Set Up; Durable construction; Compact Design
My only concern is that Staples never lets you use sale and rewards discounts on Epson toner.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Set Up; Durable construction; Easy To Use
Cons: Smudged Ink Pictures
I heard pictures would print really good but I tried the free photo paper that came with the printer and the pictures had a ton of wet ink on them and looked terrible, ghostly and smudged. hoping it's just the starter ink pack and not going to be that way for all pictures. Other than that, it's a good looking printer with lots of cool features I've yet to use and it prints quickly. It is a bit noisy though.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: fair but good for price payed with rebate
Item.Review: printer was purchased as a replacement, print quality is good but the printer has some hardware issues ie paper tray not strong will break if not carefull. output tray poor at best

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything.
Cons: Nothing
I have had an Artisan 810. I still have it. My wife uses it at her Mother’s Day Out program. She is not real computer minded but she loves both of them. I bought the 837 because of the great printer that the 810 was and is. The 810 is one of the best products I have ever purchased. So far after a few months the 837 is maintaining the same level of satisfaction for me. I highly recomend this printer. I have seen nothing that would cause me not to purchase it again or the next version for that matter. I doubt I will as this one will probably last for a very long time. One note of dislike though was I had a 2 yr service agreement through best buy on the 810. They never sent anything to tell me that it was about to expire. I wanted to take it in an ... d have it serviced. When I asked about it, I was told that it expired 2 months before. Of course I couldn't purchase it then. Maybe Best Buy needs to work on that part of thier business model. The printer thought is GREAT. (I also use it for our small business and do print pictures from time to time.) expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: The features and the low profile
Cons: Ink monster
Great printer in every aspect. Haven't been through any ink cartridges so can't comment on how long they last. I did notice Epson makes cartridges that are bigger in capacity. Will have to wait and see.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I was very disappointed with my epson artisan 837 printer. It has very poor print quality compared to my old Rx580. I can't get the wifi part to work at all. Poor documentation. Can't use installation disc with a Mac. There is no photo editing program with it for a Mac. I have always had Epson printers This may be the last one I buy.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Durable construction; Easy To Use; Fast Print Time; Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Quality color prints
Cons: Large Footprint
I also now have a fax machine and a quality printer........

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Compact Design; Easy To Use
Cons: Hard Setup
If you have a Mac, be prepared to cope with either a very slow software download (you can't used the provided disk) or very hard-to-understand support from someone in the Phillippines who does not speak English very well. But what else if new???

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: DOes just about everything you could want, I love the new cd printing tray, really much better than my old 680. multi sheet feed actually required reading the instructuions, but works great! Overall a worthy upgrade for my home office.!!!

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Very fast
I bought this printer to replace a Lexmark Pro901. The Pro901 was the worst printer I ever had. You would turn it on and have to wait almost 5 minutes before you could print and then most of the time the pages came out blank because of the defective Lexmark printheads. Lexmark sent me 3 different printheads and even though they were free it still wasn't worth it.
The Epson Artisan 837 is amazing. I love that when you turn it on the paper door opens automatically and it's ready to print in about 10 seconds. Prints very fast and the pages look great. Most people don't know if the ink cartridges move with the printhead the printer won't last as long. On the Artisan 837 the cartridges are fixed and located at the front right of the printer. It uses 6 cartridges an ... d the colored ones are about $11 at Walmart and the black is about $19. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: set-up was easy
Cons: Not able to scan or copy double sided documents
This printer works fine as long as you dont have a need to scan or copy anything that already has two sides. Product can not automaticly copy or scan double-sided media from the ADF and there does not appear to be any settings that would allow scanning double sided media into one file manualy either. You would need to combine files after saving each side as its own file. Big miss by EPSON and should be clearly stated in product specs since it is natual to assume that an all-in-one with automatic double-sided printing would also have automatic double-sided scanning and copying...unless it specificly says that function is not supported. The worst part is EPSON support doesn't appear to know their produc ... ts. They recomend a solution for this problem in the FAQ with an option that isn't even available in the driver for this model. Look elseware if you have high volumes of doublesided documents. As for the rest, I have hardly used it but the one other comment I have is it is LOUD. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
I opened the box and took plastic off and tape then went through the setup which I found very easy just follow the steps outlined in the quick setup manual.
I have printed off of my iPhone, iPad, and MacBook Pro. No CD to use to install drivers my Apple products just found the printer and I installed from each device.
I am thrilled that I can print, copy, scan and check ink level from my iPhone. The features that this printer has are nothing short of Fantastic.
I picked a great one and very happy so far. I would recommend to anyone. To be able to print off my iPhone, iPad, etc is amazing.
Done all by wireless. No cables to hook up other then telephone cable for faxing and you can hook your phone in to the back and Ethernet if need be.
I seen this icon tha ... t says CD Tray so I pushed on it with my finger and a CD Tray comes out to print on your CD/DVD now that is great. Epson you make it really easy and a joyful experience at the same time.
You are going to love this printer!!!!
Thanks Again!!! Stephen expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: The best part is the HD so fine I see the hair in a grasshoppers leg! Margins are true and perfect. I love this machine and so does my husband who accesses it wireless.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Fast Print Time; Easy To Set Up; Compact Design
Cons: Flimsy Construction; No external paper feed
I use this for both, personal and business use in my home-based studio. I've long used/trusted Epson printers, so brand loyalty kept me in the fold. This sucker is FAST! And compared to it's predecessor (the venerable 1280 large format printer) it's LIGHTENING quick! Also, I love that it has separate color ink wells. I'll no longer waste ink/money in that department. Chassis construction seems weak/flimsy, and I haven't yet used it's auto-feed copier function nor do I intend to use it's FAX feature anytime soon.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Mac users - 837 to be your only printer? Stop - DO NOT BUY! Bought for duplexing ability, which works well. Excellent color photos and faxing. That's it! Epson and Mac not communicating, no proper download for 837, missing functions that Epson is noted for such as usable scanning program. Prints poorly onto DVD's. I have Epson 500 scanner (excellent machine and a keeper) and Artisan 800 (was to be replaced) which I will now hold onto as prints well to DVD's. Come on Epson - fix your downloads to repair 837 firmware!

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: When scanning I can have the software ask to add another page. My new artisan 837 will not. I have tried the request box checked, unchecked and completed all software updates. Hope they fix it soon.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: It's versatility and clarity of prints.
Cons: I worry that the ink will dry up in between uses.
I like the way the unit prints and multi-tasks. I am worried that the ink will dry up between uses.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Low Ink Consumption; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Durable construction; Easy To Use; Fast Print Time
Great printer for mobile photographers that print on the scene

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Fast Print Time; Durable construction; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Low Ink Consumption
We neeeded a new all in one printer/fax/copy/scanner and we are so pleased with this Epson printer. the set up and interface is so easy my 10 year old helped. I can print wifi from pc, mac, iphone and ipad... installation and testing all devices took 20 minutes... the installation itself was less than 10 minutes. we are really pleased.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: speed of printing documents & photos outstanding.
Cons: nothing so far . . .
this printer is great. . .set up in a few minutes . . prints photos fast & documents even faster. I really like the auto feed for documents. It makes it soooo much faster !

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: In the first 2 weeks I have emailed a document. Most of the use has been for printing a few photos; very good. I have printed, double sided, one 3 page article re gardening, no problem. Have yet to set up for faxing etc.. Very happy.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Has all features we wanted at a very competitive price (on sale)
Cons: Basic color printing isn't as "rich" as I would expect for a 6-color printer
The printer was easy to set up with my iMac running Lion. All functions work "as advertised" very smoothly. Paper feed is finicky; however, once it is set-up correctly, everything operates fast and smooth. We're a fairly low volume printing operation. The scanner, copier, and Fax features are very nicely integrated which is one of the reasons we liked this model. Didn't try printing to CD-ROM yet, but nice bonus feature for those who may want it.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: quality with the printing of photos and brochures and it is fast
So much better than the new HP with the 3 cartridges, that just does not cut it in quality of print. This quality is great!

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
I have the Artisan 837 and overall I like it and would recommend it.
One glitch I find annoying is that wireless printing can sometimes be interrupted indefinitely due to a "communication error" that is not further defined and not fixable.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time; Easy To Use
After years of HP printers, we were advised about the qualities of the Epson from a professional photographer (weddings). The print quality is excellent and the drying time is fast!

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: This printer works well when not asking for Inkpad to be service. The problem I have with Epson products is that they have a counter which asks for the INKPADS to be serviced at a crazy cost by the software Epson installs on the printers even though it is obvious it doesn't have to be serviced. I took apart my Epson and the Inkpads had lots of life left in them because some of the inkpads were still white with no ink. Do a search on inkpad reset before you purchase this product. Epson themselves has such a tool but the Epson tool only works a few times.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Finally, after almost 20 years of nothing but HP, I decided to go back to Epson. Had one of their dot matrix printers a long time ago and liked it. The price point and features on the Artisan made it the right choice...BUT---set up was a drag and took a while.When it finally did complete, my computer could not scan because the Windows platform was not right ( Windows 7 and it wasn't right..?). Paper tray is not convenient. Paper catcher poorly designed. Having trouble with printing multiples of different weights of paper, but prints ordinary copy sheets fine. No instruction as to how to best print envelopes-- it's laughable and they come out different every time. So-- DVD with instructions is poor, website is not very helpful but unit seems solid. Not sure if it's a keeper yet.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Overall a great product for the price
Item.Review:
Pros: Prints CD's; Easy To Use
Cons: Complicated Lion setup
OS Lion drivers were not on the enclosed DVD. They had to be downloaded and the instructions on what to actually install could be better. I did figured it out and the product works great. I especially like printing from my IPhone and IPad.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time; Compact Design; Easy To Use
This printer was purchased to replace my Epson Workforce 600, which did a great job printing, scanning and faxes, but only average on photos. Buyer beware of Staple's Guarantee Price Match, they have many "*"s attached to their guarantee and would not honor a $50 lower price at National Brick-&-Mortar store advertised price in the same week!

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: 6 colors; prints to CDs; good quality
Cons: Scanner is a bit slow; ink less easy to find than HP counterparts
Highly recommend this printer for anyone looking to have a full featured printer, scanner, copier, fax.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Ease of set up and operation
Solves all my printing needs. Especially in the duplex printing mode. Document and photos are reproduced professionally and quickly.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: This printer is a problem. I wish I had time to take it back! It kinda crashes very often, meaning, about 30% of the time when I need to print a document the printer seems to be asleep and doesn't print at all, gets an error or just sits there. It takes 2 or more pieces of paper readily, and you can not put much paper into the tray. I'm running a business and I do a lot of printing so this is a problem. It actually doesn't even print very fast! It does a lot of gyrations before it's even able to print. Again, the print time is not very fast when you add in the gyrations before print. The features it offers are good, but the printer just doesn't live up to the promises.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Very good printer with interesting features.
Item.Review: The only flaw is the speed of the scanner that it is very slow compare to other printers in this price range, but if you don't need to scan much documents, you can live with it, other than that, the printer is very good for documents and photos at a very good speed. The fax works very well and the quality of the documents faxes is very good.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I bought this printer to upgrade my old printer. My old printer is also an Epson and is 8 years old. There is nothing wrong with it, I wanted a printer that was wireless to use with my laptop. I love the fact that this printer will print on both sides without you having to take the paper out and put it back in the tray the correct way to be sure it prints the right way. Also, the auto feed feature on top is nice. I recommend Epson printers all the time, you will not be sorry you bought one.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 837 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Easy To Use; Intuitive menus; Nice features
Cons: Flimsy Construction; Too much ink used; Multi-sheet feed breaks; Jams occasionally
The Artisan line of printers should deliver better quality. When the top paper feed broke down on our 810 unit , Epson did nothing to help. We were saddled with a number of their very expensive cartridges, so we selected a "better " model which would use them. So far so good, but you could hear that top paper feeder straining to do it's job....even with only 5 or 6 pages to be scanned. Epson should step up and admit that this component doesn't live up to an otherwise decent reputation as a printer company.Fix it or replace those that are out there. Don't stick your customers with your mistakes or ... they might just decide to put their review on line when repeatedly prompted to do so. expand » « collapse
